column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Absolutely loved this place.  The ambiance is great
column2: food is great and the drinks are great.  This might be my favorite "steakhouse" in the city.  I had a 10 ounce filet cooked to a perfect medium.  Melted in my mouth. My wife and I split 3 sides...the corn
column3: sweet potato and bacon.  All were very good but the bacon was my least favorite and would skip it for another side.  The corn and sweet potato are must gets.
